LanguageData.Crashlanded_Nuclear_Ghoul.label: Nuclear Consequences
LanguageData.Crashlanded_Nuclear_Ghoul.description: Three Ghouls stole an ancient artifact without even suspecting what it would lead to.
LanguageData.Crashlanded_Nuclear_Ghoul.scenario.name: Nuclear Consequences
LanguageData.Crashlanded_Nuclear_Ghoul.scenario.summa: Three explorers in search of salvation.
LanguageData.Crashlanded_Nuclear_Ghoul.scenario.descr: Three Ghouls stole an ancient artifact without even suspecting what it would lead to.
LanguageData.Crashlanded_Nuclear_Ghoul.scenario.parts: You managed to escape from your pursuers and grab a rare GECK device. But an uneasy feeling does not leave you ... why did they let you go so easily? Something tells you that you have little time and they will come for you soon.
